comment.body: From today blocking "mbp.hanabank.com" happens again..... Last time i heard you guys changed DNS server cache setting, and it seemed working. However, the problem happens again(mbp.hanabank.com DNS response is SERVFAIL)... Have you changed server setting again?

issue.title: abcya.com
issue.body:
### Prerequisites

- [X] This site DOES NOT contain sexually explicit material, otherwise use [NSFW-specific form](./new?template=bug_report_NSFW.yml);
- [X] Filters were updated before reproducing an issue;
- [X] AdGuard product version is up-to-date;
- [X] Browser version is up-to-date;
- [X] If the site or app is broken, disabling AdGuard protection resolves an issue.

### What product do you use?

Other ad blocker

### AdGuard version

uBlock Origin v1.50.1b6

### What type of problem have you encountered?

Annoyances — pop-ups, cookie warnings, etc.

### Which browser(s) do you use?

Firefox

### Which device do you use?

Desktop

### Where is the problem encountered?

https://www.abcya.com/

### What filters do you have enabled?

AdGuard Cookie Notices filter, EasyList Cookie List

### What Stealth Mode options do you have enabled?

_No response_

### Add your comment and screenshots

1. <comment>
Cookie filter list causes a gap to appear at the top of the page.

2. Screenshots
<details><summary>Screenshot 1:</summary>

![249037426-2408eab4-8d6d-456d-822a-e0a3cbad5c89](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/assets/89158249/6bc3de49-7ba4-4d85-82fc-911b71f21403)


</details>

<details><summary>Screenshot 2:</summary>

![249037435-3cdf5809-7d4a-4950-ae5f-aff91be99358](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/assets/89158249/768fe669-fd30-4960-86b1-9b6c3bf59b2d)


</details>


### Privacy

- [X] I agree to follow this condition

issue.title: pan.baidu.com
issue.body:
### Issue URL (Annoyance) [https://pan.baidu.com/pfile/video?path=%2F1%E8%80%83%E7%A0%94%2F24%E5%BE%90%E6%B6%9B%E6%94%BF%E6%B2%BB%2F03+%E5%BC%BA%E5%8C%96%E7%8F%AD%2F02.%E9%A9%AC%E5%8E%9F%2F22.24%E8%80%83%E7%A0%94%E6%94%BF%E6%B2%BB%E5%BC%BA%E5%8C%96%E7%8F%AD-%E9%A9%AC%E5%8E%9F-21-%E5%9E%84%E6%96%AD%E5%8F%8A%E5%BD%93%E4%BB%A3%E8%B5%84%E6%9C%AC%E4%B8%BB%E4%B9%89%EF%BC%88%E3%80%90%E5%85%AC%E4%BC%97%E5%8F%B7%EF%BC%9A%E7%A0%94%E5%B0%8F%E6%96%99%E3%80%91%E5%85%8D%E8%B4%B9%E5%88%86%E4%BA%AB%EF%BC%89.mp4&theme=light&from=home#1393](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fpan.baidu.com%2Fpfile%2Fvideo%3Fpath%3D%252F1%25E8%2580%2583%25E7%25A0%2594%252F24%25E5%25BE%2590%25E6%25B6%259B%25E6%2594%25BF%25E6%25B2%25BB%252F03%2B%25E5%25BC%25BA%25E5%258C%2596%25E7%258F%25AD%252F02.%25E9%25A9%25AC%25E5%258E%259F%252F22.24%25E8%2580%2583%25E7%25A0%2594%25E6%2594%25BF%25E6%25B2%25BB%25E5%25BC%25BA%25E5%258C%2596%25E7%258F%25AD-%25E9%25A9%25AC%25E5%258E%259F-21-%25E5%259E%2584%25E6%2596%25AD%25E5%258F%258A%25E5%25BD%2593%25E4%25BB%25A3%25E8%25B5%2584%25E6%259C%25AC%25E4%25B8%25BB%25E4%25B9%2589%25EF%25BC%2588%25E3%2580%2590%25E5%2585%25AC%25E4%25BC%2597%25E5%258F%25B7%25EF%25BC%259A%25E7%25A0%2594%25E5%25B0%258F%25E6%2596%2599%25E3%2580%2591%25E5%2585%258D%25E8%25B4%25B9%25E5%2588%2586%25E4%25BA%25AB%25EF%25BC%2589.mp4%26theme%3Dlight%26from%3Dhome%231393) ### Comment > 在播放视频时候，自动跳出来，导致视频暂停，多次跳出的窗口 ### Screenshots

issue.title: linkpays.in
issue.body:
### Issue URL (Incorrect Blocking) [https://linkpays.in/kbjt9c](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Flinkpays.in%2Fkbjt9c) ### Comment > In the past, when I turned on Adguard, I would not have had to wait more than 15 seconds to receive my file link, but now I have to wait more than 30 seconds to receive my file link. This indicates that Adguard is not functioning properly with the website. ### Screenshots
Screenshot 1 ![Screenshot 1](https://cdn.adtidy.org/sitereports/a8ktotkgrmok88g0kkkc0gwog48k008n5nkzanjmtc.png?nc=1)
Screenshot 2 ![Screenshot 2](https://cdn.adtidy.org/sitereports/3xa99kxrhhus8gwkos0c084gkosw8sc4v41aq8rhvs.png?nc=1)
